sourcesContent:
import { Component, ElementRef, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { LayoutService } from 'src/app/layout/service/app.layout.service'; import { trigger, state, style, animate, transition } from '@angular/animations'; @Component({ selector: 'app-landing', templateUrl: './landing.component.html', styleUrls:['./landing.component.scss'], animations: [ trigger('fadeIn', [ state('show', style({ opacity: 1 })), state('hide', style({ opacity: 0 })), transition('hide => show', animate('500ms ease-in')), ]), ], }) export class LandingComponent { isNavbarGray = false; isResponsiveMenuGray: boolean = false; animationState = { highlights: 'hide', features: 'hide', // Add more section IDs as needed }; constructor(public layoutService: LayoutService, public router: Router,public el: ElementRef) { } toggleNavbarColor() { this.isNavbarGray = true; } @HostListener('window:scroll', ['$event']) onScroll() { this.isNavbarGray = window.scrollY > 100; // Adjust the scroll position threshold const sections = ['highlights', 'features']; // Add more section IDs as needed sections.forEach(section => { const offset = 100; const threshold = 0.3; const scrollPosition = window.scrollY; const windowHeight = window.innerHeight; const element = document.getElementById(section); if (element) { const elementPosition = element.offsetTop; const elementHeight = element.offsetHeight; const isVisible = scrollPosition + windowHeight > elementPosition + offset && scrollPosition < elementPosition + elementHeight - offset; this.animationState[section] = isVisible ? 'show' : 'hide'; } }); } ngOnInit() { // Initial check in case the component is already in view on page load this.onScroll(); } }
